name: Zombies In A Mall Simulator
description:
An upcoming zombie game for PCVR (Rift/S) and Quest2 headsets. An experiment in weapon types, crowded areas, minor puzzles, and multiple areas chained together to form one cohesive world.

Game Demo Super Alpha Edition now released - Enjoy some choppy, janky, buggy zombie slaying. Enjoy virtual zombie slaying from your favorite Canadian developer! (No, not that one)
